name: Press The Button (Steventus)
description:
Welcome back, #1000789!

We hope you are just as EXCITED as we are to have you back here! You are an important asset to your company! ^_^

We have SO much things to sort through and we ABSOLUTELY need your help for these. Don't worry, for a professional of your CALIBER - we are certain you will excel!

Work hard, work smart, #1000789!

==================================================

Ludum Dare 47 page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/press-the-button

==================================================

This is a submission for Ludum Dare 47: Stuck in a loop.

You only need your mouse to play.

All assets are done by me, during the jam duration.
